Message:
As snow continued
to fall overhead,
I gazed into Boss’s eyes.

It’s strange...
I can’t hear
anything else around us.

All I can hear
is the loud thumping
of my own heart...

Urgh... For some reason,
I can’t look Boss in the eye.

B-But, I’m gonna say it!
You can do this, Stella...!
“B-Boss, I...ah...ah...
AH-CHOO!”

Uuu...! I-It’s way colder
than I thought...!

When I started to shiver,
Boss wrapped his scarf
around me.

“B-But, if you
give me this, you’ll...

Huh? ‘I’m more
important...?’ Haah...!”

Uuu, I know there’s no
deeper meaning to it...
It’s just because
Boss is nice...

But, when Boss smiles,
I feel happy too...

That’s why everyone
around him always has
smiles on their faces.
Since Boss is so nice,
everyone...and...
“I...really do love...”

...Huh...? Wait...
D-Did I-I...j-j-just...?!

“U-Uh... S-Snow!!
The snow sure
is pretty, huh?!
Ahahaha...!”
Was that too obvious...?

But, just as I’d expect
from everyone’s Boss,
he only smiled and said,
“It is, isn’t it?”...

Jeez, he has no clue
how I feel, does he?
But...

“It really is pretty,
huh, Boss?”

The two of us gazed on
at the falling snow.
Right now, this is
more than enough.
It’s the most effort
I can muster
as I am now.

“Now then,
without further ado,
allow me to show you
my new technique!

Make sure and
watch closely, Boss~!♪”
